creator: thorsten@apache.org
text:
The overview will always order only in one direction. Attached patch allows to
order bidirectional.

creator: thorsten@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 20194
Patch that allows bidirectional sorting (asc/desc)

creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
Cool feature!
Maybe we should display the arrow images without the blue border?

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: Or maybe we use simple triangles, like in Thunderbird and MacOS Finder?

creator: thorsten@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 20196
second version

Do you have a link for the triangles images? I just took the one we have in
cforms. :)

I added a class for the images to get rid of the border (.lenya-no-border).
Please feel free to extend/modify the patch to include other images.
